title: Minecraft Cup 2023 Encouragement Award
description: The world created by our team won an award at the Minecraft Cup regional tournament held in Japan.

title: "Minecraft EDU Challenge Winner"
description: The Minecraft world I created was chosen as the second place in the senior division of the Minecraft Education Challenge organized by the Ministry of Education Malaysia, Sunway Malls, and Microsoft.

title: Programming instructor
description: I am an instructor at the online programming school "Classmall Kids" operated by YAGO Co., Ltd. We are currently offering classes using the video game "Minecraft" and more.

title: IDEACTIVE JAPAN PROJECT Student Ambassador
description: Microsoft, SoftBank, Meta, VISITS, and IOT Biz Lab, 5 companies, are planning a business contest called "IDEACTIVE JAPAN PROJECT". I am in charge of marketing as a student ambassador. We also organize events such as the "IDEA CREATION WORKSHOP" hackathon for elementary school students using Minecraft.

title: Team Outstndrs
description: Started with the winning of the Minecraft Cup, it is a group of digital creators gathered by eccentric students. They are active online in various digital fields such as world creation using Minecraft, videos, 3D CG, urban planning, and more. Anyone can join the server.

title: Minecraft Cup 2021 Finalists & Winners
description: With a few friends, I competed in a Minecraft competition to showcase our technical skills and critical thinking abilities. We became finalists and won an award, which became a significant turning point.
